text:
RULEMATCH is a trading
and settlement venue

for digital assets
such as cryptocurrencies,

exclusively serving
financial institutions

such as banks or
securities firms.

At Ergon Informatik
we help other companies

with developing their
software or their solutions.
We very early on selected

our partners very carefully
and we have in that case

also chosen Ergon in Zurich
to be one of our key

integrators and long-term
partners in software development.

We have a relatively
close collaboration

with AWS, usually in regards
to our customers.

We work with RULEMATCH as 
kind of their engineering team.

So, they come to us with problems
and then we figure out

how to implement this
in our solution.
And we use AWS primarily
for hosting and also

for a lot of managed services
that we don't want to
build ourselves.
We build the entire clearing

and settlement system
for their exchange.

In the case of AWS we found
the ability to really deploy also

proper cryptographic
solutions and encryption

to bring in our own keys
also the fact that AWS

is really properly
supporting the Swiss

legal frameworks, I think itâ€™s
certainly also very important
for us, working with regulated

financial institutions
in Switzerland and abroad.
Data protection

is certainly an interesting topic
for this customers.

They have their own expertise
in legal requirements
and we then help them with

actually figuring out
how to do that on AWS.
For example,

where to store data,
how to log access to it,

can object log
help you there,

what are retention requirements,
and all kinds of stuff there.
